I fixed it… I guess none of us noticed… but the playerskill # was wrong… it should be 1… the strength 1 had 1 and def had 2…

item.title: Saying 120 def without being there!?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

case 2: // Defence if (playerLevel[2] < 120) { sendFrame164(6253); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level!", 6254); sendFrame126("Your defence level is now "+playerLevel[1]+" .", 6255); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level."); stillgfx(199, absY, absX); NpcDialogueSend = true; } else { sendMessage("Congratulations on getting Level 120 Defence!"); sendMessage("Use ::achievementcapes to recieve your cape!"); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level!", 6254); sendFrame126("Your defence level is now "+playerLevel[1]+" .", 6255); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" just got 120 Defence! Congratulaions!"; } break;

item.title: Saying 120 def without being there!?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

case 2: // Defence if (playerLevel[2] == 120) { sendMessage("Congratulations on getting Level 120 Defence!"); sendMessage("Use ::achievementcapes to recieve your cape!"); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level!", 6254); sendFrame126("Your defence level is now "+playerLevel[1]+" .", 6255); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" just got 120 Defence! Congratulaions!"; } else { sendFrame164(6253); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level!", 6254); sendFrame126("Your defence level is now "+playerLevel[1]+" .", 6255); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level."); stillgfx(199, absY, absX); NpcDialogueSend = true; } break;
Try that.

item.title: Saying 120 def without being there!?
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

That’s why what? I looked at both and they look the same… but 1 works and the other 1 doesn’t so I asked for help…

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" just got 120 Defence! Congratulaions!"; <------------------------

Wow, dude what about it, I already knew that for days… rofl… im saying that i want i to say it when you actually get 120 def… man, I’m not a noob that doesn’t try…

Read full topic

item.title: Saying 120 def without being there!?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“X F U R Y X, post:1, topic:161654”]Hey, I made it so that it told every1 that some1 has 120 def… but it says it even if theyre not there yet… Here is my case…

case 2: // Defence sendFrame164(6253); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level!", 6254); sendFrame126("Your defence level is now "+playerLevel[1]+" .", 6255); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level."); stillgfx(199, absY, absX); if (playerLevel[2] == 120) { sendMessage("Congratulations on getting Level 120 Defence!"); sendMessage("Use ::achievementcapes to recieve your cape!"); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level!", 6254); sendFrame126("Your defence level is now "+playerLevel[1]+" .", 6255); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" just got 120 Defence! Congratulaions!"; <------------------------ } NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

Any1 know why?[/quote]

Maybe that’s why…

You should put more effort into helping yourself before you post.
Not trying to sound rude, just a suggestion.

Wait, hold on… I don’t have it yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Saying 120 def without being there!?
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Here is my attack case, and it works just fine…

case 0: // Attack levelup sendFrame164(6247); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!", 6248); sendFrame126("Your attack level is now "+playerLevel[0]+" .", 6249); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level."); stillgfx(199, absY, absX); if (playerLevel[0] == 120) { sendMessage("Congratulations on getting Level 120 Attack!"); sendMessage("Use ::achievementcapes to recieve your cape!"); sendFrame164(6247); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!", 6248); sendFrame126("Your attack level is now "+playerLevel[0]+" .", 6249); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" just got 120 Attack! Congratulaions!"; } NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

case 2: // Defence sendFrame164(6253); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level!", 6254); sendFrame126("Your defence level is now "+playerLevel[1]+" .", 6255); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level."); stillgfx(199, absY, absX); if (playerLevel[2] == 120) { sendMessage("Congratulations on getting Level 120 Defence!"); sendMessage("Use ::achievementcapes to recieve your cape!"); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level!", 6254); sendFrame126("Your defence level is now "+playerLevel[1]+" .", 6255); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" just got 120 Defence! Congratulaions!"; } NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

Any1 know why?
